name: UpdateCart
description:
Update a specific cart in an e-commerce store.

This tool updates a specified cart within a given e-commerce store using the Mailchimp Marketing API. Use it to modify cart details like items, quantities, or any other attributes available. Ideal for scenarios involving cart adjustments before customer checkout.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the store where the cart is located.

parameters.name: cart_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the cart. Used to specify which cart to update in the e-commerce store.

parameters.name: cart_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the cart details to update including customer info, campaign ID, checkout URL, currency code, order total, tax total, and line items.

opt_in_status.description: The customer's opt-in status. This value will never overwrite the opt-in status of a pre-existing Mailchimp list member, but will apply to list members that are added through the e-commerce API endpoints. Customers who don't opt in to your Mailchimp list [will be added as `Transactional` members](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/e-commerce/#customers).

address1.description: The mailing address of the customer.

address2.description: An additional field for the customer's mailing address.

city.description: The city the customer is located in.

province.description: The customer's state name or normalized province.

province_code.description: The two-letter code for the customer's province or state.

postal_code.description: The customer's postal or zip code.

country_code.description: The two-letter code for the customer's country.

customer.description: Information about a specific customer. Orders for existing customers should include only the `id` parameter in the `customer` object body.

campaign_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the campaign associated with a cart.

checkout_url.description: The URL for the cart. This parameter is required for [Abandoned Cart](https://mailchimp.com/help/create-an-abandoned-cart-email/) automations.

currency_code.description: The three-letter ISO 4217 code for the currency that the cart uses.

order_total.description: The order total for the cart.

tax_total.description: The total tax for the cart.

product_id.description: A unique identifier for the product associated with the cart line item.

product_variant_id.description: A unique identifier for the product variant associated with the cart line item.

quantity.description: The quantity of a cart line item.

price.description: The price of a cart line item.

lines.description: An array of the cart's line items.
